text: I know you are thinkin malaria. But relax, children cant handle malaria. She would have been worse and its gastroenteritis. If she takes enough to replace her loss her temp will reduce. And if you give her malaria meds now she will just vomit. Its a self limiting illness she has which means in a few days it will completely stop
the house had a tiny little mouse
the mouse ran away from the house
the cat finally ate the mouse
the end of the mouse story
